name: light-that-burns-the-sky
flavor_text: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.  This move ignores the target’s Ability.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher. Determining which stat is used takes into account stat changes but not held items or abilities.
effect_text_simple: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.
